SELECT A.SCHDUL_ID, A.SCHDUL_SE, A.SCHDUL_DEPT_ID, A.SCHDUL_KND_CODE SCHDUL_KIND_CODE, A.SCHDUL_BGNDE, A.SCHDUL_ENDDE, A.SCHDUL_NM, A.SCHDUL_CN, A.SCHDUL_PLACE, A.SCHDUL_IPCR_CODE, A.SCHDUL_CHARGER_ID, A.ATCH_FILE_ID, DATE_FORMAT(A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, '%Y-%m-%d') AS FRST_REGISTER_PNTTM, (SELECT USER_NM FROM COMTNEMPLYRINFO WHERE ESNTL_ID = A.FRST_REGISTER_ID) FRST_REGISTER_NM, A.FRST_REGISTER_ID, DATE_FORMAT(A.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, '%Y-%m-%d') AS LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, A.LAST_UPDUSR_ID, A.REPTIT_SE_CODE FROM COMTNSCHDULINFO A WHERE 1=1
AND SCHDUL_NM LIKE CONCAT ('%', #{searchKeyword},'%')
AND SCHDUL_CN LIKE CONCAT ('%', #{searchKeyword},'%')
ORDER BY A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM DESC LIMIT #{recordCountPerPage} OFFSET #{firstIndex}
